alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fairfield, western New Haven and northern Westchester Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shelton to near Weston to near Greenwich. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, New Haven, Stamford, Waterbury, Norwalk, Danbury, Milford, Wallingford, Shelton, Naugatuck, Southbury, New Canaan, Mount Kisco, Newtown and Fairfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven
